text: The 2017 William Jones Cup was the 39th staging of William Jones Cup, an international basketball tournament held in Taipei, Taiwan. == Men's tournament == === Participating teams === === Team standings === |} Source: ====Day 1==== ====Day 2==== ====Day 3==== ====Day 4==== ====Day 5==== ====Day 6==== ====Day 7==== ====Day 8==== ====Day 9==== == Women's tournament == === Participating teams === === Team standings === |} Source: ====Day 1==== ====Day 2==== ====Day 3==== ====Day 4==== ====Day 5==== ==Awards== ===Men's tournament=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- ! 2017 William Jones Cup |- | Team Canada 150 First title, second title for the country |- |} ===Women's tournament=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- ! 2017 William Jones Cup |- | Japan U24 First title, second title for the country |- |} == Notes == == References == 2017 Category:2017 in Taiwanese sport Category:2017–18 in Asian basketball
